title: [GAMEPLAY] Kennen ult is invisible
body: I just played an ARAM game. The enemy team had a Blood Moon Kennen but for some reason whenever he ulted i couldnt see any of the ult's effects, he just kinda shouted and i would stand there seeing everyone get stunned but no ult.

replies.body:
Hey Silvertalon13 -

Thanks for the report! We are aware of the issue, but haven't been able to lock down a solid repro for this issue. We're still investigating.
